website_summaries.verdict: This 24-count set of shatterproof balls is available in a range of solid colors, including a highly popular rose gold/pink shade.
pros: A mix of shiny, matte, glitter and scalloped balls will give you a great foundation for a color coordinated tree
Comes in a choice of 3 sizes (1.57, 2.36 and 3.15 inches diameter.)
cons: While shatterproof, some did pick up dents
Take note of the sizes: the smallest are really mini-balls

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for. I got the pale blue and champagne in all 3 sizes - see photo for size reference. They bounce when you drop them and are completely shatterproof. They aren’t perfect... some have little marks on them and a couple arrived broken but for the money you can’t beat it. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: MINI ornaments
customer_reviews.text: I didn't pay close attention to the measurements and I should've. Here is a container of balls from Wal-Mart vs these...so you can see exactly what to expect! These are cute but very tiny so be prepared. I should've read the reviews closer but I think "mini" should be directly in the title of these
customer_reviews.author: JDOT R

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: A majority of the balls received were either damaged or poorly made. There were also discolorations on some of the ornaments that cannot be blamed on shipping. If I saw these in a store I absolutely would have never purchased them. I got tired of taking pictures of all of the defunct ornaments. The set was supposed to be champagne colored but most were half that and half a god-awful gray. The best way to describe the quality of these ornaments... dollar tree would put them on clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Toni C

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these ornaments! I ordered the small size in pink. It's the prettiest shade of pink, not too bright. And they are definitely shatter proof, but not dent proof. One ornament was damaged in shipping and had a small dent. Not a big deal. Overall, I'm pleasantly surprised. For the price, i wasn't sure what to expect. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous pink ornaments!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for the perfect light pink ornaments, and these were it! They are a light pink/rose gold color. I love that they are shatterproof, perfect size, and pretty! One of them had the top missing so I couldn't hang one, but 23 ornament balls were enough for my tree.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly cheap
customer_reviews.text: 8 of the ornaments arrived broken. I still have 6 more colors to go through to see if they're worth keeping at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CustomerS

customer_reviews.title: Teal is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are a little smaller than your typical Christmas ornament but you really can’t tell much differently. They look beautiful on my tree, it’s my favorite color! I’ve attached a photo next to a “regular” size ornament for reference. :)
customer_reviews.author: Gabii

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Textures & Vibrantly Colored....
customer_reviews.text: I love these ornaments. I got the 2.36" size in Teal and Florescent Pink for my mini tree (about 3ft tall). They were the perfect size-- not too small or overpowering. I'd probably go a size up for a full sized tree. The bulbs were lightweight and easy to affix to the branches. They come with their own pre-attached string loops so no hooks required. What I loved about them the most were the variations in texture. The glitter ones were the prettiest in low light. It's nice to have the look of "fine glass bulbs" without the shatter risk. I even used the extras to make a table centerpiece to match the tree. I'd definitely recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: TaurusDIVA79

customer_reviews.title: Super cute little ornaments perfect for mini trees or decor
customer_reviews.text: Super cute little ornaments perfect for mini trees or decor. They came prestrung but also came with mini hooks to hang on tree. There is minimal glitter fallout, so you don't have to worry about your house looking like some unicorns or other creatures got together, had a party and left you with their glittery mess to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy rae

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend these CUTE Christmas Balls
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend these CUTE Christmas Balls!! I chose the red one and they are so pretty. Everyone comes to my house is surprised by the decoration. It is really nice to decorate your house or Christmas trees with these cute balls. The color is pretty and quality of the balls is better than I thought. Now I am considering to buy more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are not your standard size ornament as advertised. They are just a bit smaller but they worked perfectly for what i needed. There are like 6 different types in the package and of those i only didn't love 2 designed. They looked a little too cheap but again they worked fine for what i needed. My tree already being done i just wanted a few to bulk up the rose gold in the gaps and some in vases around the house. Some are perfectly gorgeous so they went on the tree. Those that i didn't love were used in decorative vases where they blend with others. Over all GREAT purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leelina M

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't work for the craft we bought them for.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't work for the craft we bought them for. Was disappointed, we bought to use as a Neighborhood community craft for kids to make ornaments that they decorated with their fingerprints & we couldn't use all the ornaments because they wouldn't except or show the paint or markers. For standard ornament decorations they would be ok. Many were rolling around the bottom of the box when we received them & one the package looked to have been resealed with packing tape.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Ok at best
customer_reviews.text: Ok, 3-stars because these are CHEAP! They are shatterproof, and I get it, that’s means plastic but these are really cheap, especially for the cost. A little too much money for something that’s a less quality than what I could have found at the dollar store for 1/3 the price. Very visible seams on some where the mold was created. Cheap plastic where the hook attaches to the ornament. It’s just bad. If I wasn’t in a bind, I’d consider returning them
customer_reviews.author: Menoc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Used to make my custom door hanger/ diva wreath and it turned out great. Color is true to image and sizing was perfect! Not too big and not too small. Nice variety with different designs
customer_reviews.author: BSweets

customer_reviews.title: Great for coastal theme tree
customer_reviews.text: Great for coastal theme tree. I mixed them with champagne colored ornaments as well as shells and seahorses.
customer_reviews.author: Coroc

customer_reviews.title: Good company, cute ornaments
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you get the right size. The small ones are TINY. I re-ordered the larger size, and amazon sent the incorrect ones. I went directly to the company, and they were great to work with, and sent me out the correct size from their warehouse. The ornaments are cute, they feel a little cheap so we will see how well they hold up, but for right now I REALLY like them and the champagne color is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: LeahJA

customer_reviews.title: Very small in size - the color is pretty.  Chances are you would not buy these in person.
customer_reviews.text: I was planning a purple themed tree and wanted variety in my ornaments. I didn’t have time to go store to store and so I ordered these. I should have noticed how small they were. I would not have paid for them if I had seen them first. They are a nice color and not worth returning; just a big miss for the value. Note the details before making an order.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Balakos

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but great value for the product
customer_reviews.text: Half of the ornaments have a viable line where the two spheres were fused together. So half of them I threw away. The other half are beautiful and look great on my tree. These are great for the value, but be aware that these are cheaply made and are not top notch. They’re great for people who own pets and don’t want to spend too much since they might get knocked over anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Def worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even hang them all up, there was so many! And I only had a 4 ft tree in my apartment. I also decorated my window sill and STILL had about 9 balls left. Would buy smaller quantity in more variety of colors because it’s mainly just variations of the blue ones and a few grey/silver. My Christmas theme this year was “blue Christmas” but it kind of overkilled my tree with the dark blue, but in general it was an amazing product. I dropped several ornaments while taking down decorations and not a single one dropped. (the snowflakes and tinsel are also from amazon).
customer_reviews.author: N. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price! Pet/kid friendly.
customer_reviews.text: These ornaments are plastic, so they will feel cheap. However, unlike glass ornaments, if your cat knocks a few off the tree they won't shatter. They have string instead of hooks, so if that bothers you I'd recommend purchasing your own hooks and cutting the string off. They are medium sized (if you don't consider the super giant ornaments "large"). I've attached a photo so you can see what they look like on a 6.5 ft artificial tree. Only the white ones were included. (Gold & silver were purchased at a BX). It came with a lot so we hung ornaments on the back of the tree as well.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: Giving a 3 overall because 1/3 of these ornaments were dented beyond repair when they were first taken out of the package. I will say that I did buy some smaller sizes and colors besides these (same brand) and did not seem to have any issue with those, so could have been a fluke or could be an issue with the larger sized ornaments. We used what we could and made them work, but if you need *ALL* the ornaments that come with this then you may want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Just as good quality as hobby lobby ornaments
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lavender light purple in 60mm. The silver and white ornaments pictured were from hobby lobby & they’re the same quality! Glitter falls on both types but not too crazy. I had trouble finding this color at the store & was delighted to find it here :) For all glitter ornaments obviously falls a bit here & there but it’s not a big deal because they’re gorgeous once hung! Also as durable as any other plastic I’ve bought in previous years so that’s another thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Jossboss

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection of colors
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough ornaments for the price if you are looking for specific colors. This vendor had a lot of colors to choose from. I ordered champagne, green and burgundy, but kept only champagne. They look like they will hold up adequately but denting may be an issue (a couple were already dented in pkg). Not a fan of glittered balls but the others were attractive.
customer_reviews.author: HMP

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, but they were the color I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so let me start by saying I actually do really like them, however they are overpriced. They are dollar store quality and at least 10 of them were damaged. The reason I gave them 4 stars is because although they are overpriced and not well packaged I could find champagne and pearl color anywhere else. They really added the finishing touch to my tree. If they had been basic colors I could find anywhere I would get them elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: These are good for the price and great for outdoor use! Some came slightly dented (but hey, you know they're plastic and not likely to break) and the glitter ones are missing glitter in some visible patches, but since they're hanging on my yews, no one is looking at them that closely. Overall a good value, good sturdiness, and I plan to get more.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Love them especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. My only have 4 stars for presentation. Because some had their string glued under the top of the ornament. And they popped off when trying to gently remove the string . Just glued back on. And because the flat blue color is awful. They look dirty from the jump.then touch them to hang them. And have finger prints all over that you cant wipe off. I still loved them. And they look great on my tree
customer_reviews.author: Plentiful32

customer_reviews.title: Odd color
customer_reviews.text: How you interpret “cream” color maybe different then mine. I found these not very pretty color wise. The most have a grey-ish tone and the sparkly ones look silver. They throw in other shiny silver balls just to fill up the container. I just needed some fill-ins for the tree in a off white but these did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: variety of designs in package
customer_reviews.text: Black adds a distinction and some extra definition to the christmas tree. Love the four different designed in this package. However two of the black glitter balls had small sections of missing glitter when opened, possibly due to shipping so 4 star rating. Would recommend product and going to order a few more colors for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Probably good for child's tree
customer_reviews.text: The ornaments certainly seemed to be durable which would be good for the frenetic activity of Children at Christmas. The casting marks bothered me, but wouldn't matter to a child. The red had more of a chrome cast than what I wanted. Grateful for Amazon Prime return feature - otherwise, these would be taking up storage space that I don't have
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon but honest

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: I made a very nice Christmas wreath with 3 different colors of these balls and a metal coat hanger. It turned out beautiful. I did have to super glue some of the balls together because the hook part kept coming out. Some of the balls were broke at delivery but the company sent me a refund for the broken ones. I couldn't be happier for their company service.
customer_reviews.author: Michele W

customer_reviews.title: Love the shapes and colors
customer_reviews.text: The prettiest ornaments and shapes. What a beautiful blue. True to color. So glad I did not wait and then get the left over colors. I got the large ones, really makes a statement even in the box. All set for Christmas now. Don’t have to expose myself to the pandemic and search the stores. Great price too. Shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: K nurse

customer_reviews.title: They are a wonderful addition to our ornaments for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these Christmas balls really surprised me. They are a wonderful addition to our ornaments for Christmas. I'm seriously considering ordering a second pack with a different colour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought to decorate this little birch tree I have in my kitchen, just to spice it up and add some color. I really needed small ornaments to make it work and this turned out great! I am really happy with the fall colors and it brightens up the area. I'll definitely be buying more for other holidays in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jchuk16

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality and 100% plastic
customer_reviews.text: Everyone’s pictures made these look like descent ornaments. Mine showed up and looked beyond cheap! Like dollar store cheap. And mine are 100% plastic - don’t know how people’s are breaking. These would just flatten. I’m going to keep them in hopes of using them for fillers but going to go buy nicer ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 sets, medium navy, large teal, large bronze. They arrived all in one piece. The seam is not as noticeable as some of the reviews and photos state. Maybe they changed the product or maybe people are too picky. The price for this many ornaments cannot be beat. I tried to find cheaper alternatives for these colors and sizes and it just doesn’t exist. The bronze is more if a deep orange but we love it! I needed plastic because my cat thinks they are toys. He swats then off the tree and flings then around the floor like a toy and they are still holding up. Will big again if I need to change my color theme
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Z.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wanted some white Christmas balls for my red Christmas tree, that I also purchased from this company. The balls are the size of a ping pong ball. Also, there are only a few whites, most of them are frost, not white. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: coleen brown

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and safe.
customer_reviews.text: These are really pretty ornaments for the price and material. We needed something that wasn't going to break since my 2 year old still gets into pretty things, I'm happy they are safe. My 4 year old loves purple and she was ecstatic to decorate our small tree with these pretty ornaments.
customer_reviews.author: lili

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ... but not SUPER durable!
customer_reviews.text: I was torn on how to review these ... They look amazing in my fall tree, they are the perfect size, and I love the different textures of them, BUT some of them were dented so I had to make sure the dented side was facing in but honestly, I’d still probably buy them again for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SchoepFam11

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for my Kwanzaa theme tree!
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today and love them! I put them right on our tree and it adds just the right touch I was looking for. We are starting our Kwanzaa celebration this year as well as love the spirit of Christmas. So having red, black, and green bulbs was key. I will be adding other things that celebrates Kwanzaa but this was the start. I also love the fact that I could take them right out the package and hang them. I didn’t have to attach any of the hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Faithnlove

customer_reviews.title: Nice red Christmas tree balls
customer_reviews.text: I really like that the seller included hooks to hang these and the hooks are green..just like my tree, how cool is that? Also the ball are not glass. I have memories of my brother who ate a glass ball in the sixties... So glad these are not glass.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the price! I was a bit worried that the quality of the ornaments wouldn’t be too great, but everything was perfect! They’re durable, look nice, and are affordable. I love that one pack comes with so many ornaments! I’ll definitely be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: I was very satisfied with my ornaments
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with my ornaments! Colors were great I bought the larger size it was perfect for my tree. I bought 3 packs because I wanted 3 colors. Everyone that complains about size probably bought the smaller one. You get what you asked for the larger ones are about an average ornament size.
customer_reviews.author: Crys Cee

customer_reviews.title: Small but good
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought I was ordering but that’s my own fault for not reading the whole title, I did receive an email from the seller after my purchase pointing out that they were small which I thought was odd but overall a good purchase and they look good paired with some larger ornaments as well
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Ellegant.
customer_reviews.text: My first Christmas tree in my new house with a kitten, I opted for these simply because they wouldn't shatter. They don't look plastic, I found my self tapping them to make sure I actually bought shatter proof globes. After Christmas was over i found these bulbs under other furniture, Obviously the kitten still managed to smack them around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these ornaments! I've made quite a few things with them. I've even accidentally dropped some on the ground and they did not break. All of the ornaments in the pictures are made with these ornaments. I will continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Rennee

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking that they would look cheap, I was wrong. The quality of them is better then what I had ordered from overstock. the ones from over stock you could see the blow mold seam, with these you can tell. would order again. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, grossly overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large white set. They look aweful. I am outraged that charged me $17 for these. I wouldn't pay $2 for them if I saw them in a store. The plastic on some is almost transparent. They're really cheap and ugly ornaments. I've seen nice looking plastic ornaments... these are not them. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ornaments
customer_reviews.text: The color of the ornaments are beautiful and vibrant. I can not tell you how durable they are because I just added them to my tree.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Brady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Durable and sparkly
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable. I dropped a couple by accident from a far distance but it did absolutely no damage. Hooks were perfect plus it came with a package of extra ones which I ended up needing for a different set, wonderful! Saved me time and effort of having to go to the store. They’re beautiful sparkly bulbs. I am pleased. I will definitely be buying more in the future for a second tree
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Varga

customer_reviews.title: KI Store 32 count Ball Ornaments are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and well worth the cost. I would have given 5 stars but a few of the bulbs are unusable due to missing tops. Other then that they are beautiful
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: JUNK but great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this zero stars, not an option. These are not even big enough for a mini tree, don’t be fooled and don’t buy this crap!!! UPDATE: so after my not so pleasant review, this company reached out to me and gave me a 20% refund and assured me that they are going to use coins for size reference in the future. So for that I’ve increased their stars to three. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Kirvin

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, package in rough shape
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, especially the glitter ones. Package was extremely beat up upon arrival and taped shut with packing tape. Red ball pictured is missing the string to be hung. Plus side is there’s plenty of balls. The silver balls I ordered were in a terribly beat up package taped up like crazy. And there’s some broken balls inside... disappointing. Glad I didn’t order the glass ones at least..
customer_reviews.author: C & O

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ornaments
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the aqua blue ornaments to go with my home decor and they are so pretty! I have a small tree and the pack of 20 mixed with some silver ornaments I already had was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni82

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but very little
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and quality, but tiny ornaments! My fault for not reading the fine print. They are VERY little, for a mini tree only. And if that is what you're looking for, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bohr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I used the 4” rose gold and 3” blush set on my tree this year. I also bought a 3” rose gold set and attached photos for color comparison. All colors and sizes are gorgeous and look great together. Only one blush ornament had a missing chunk of glitter and could easily be used in the back. I dropped the first 4” ornament I pulled out of the container by accident and it bounced right back up. I was impressed it did not break! Really appreciate this sturdy design as I have a few goofy dogs that may wiggle up against the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these bulbs. I bought three different colors. I bought the red, dark green, and champagne colored bulbs. All were very beautiful. The only thing I noticed that I didn't like was that on the champagne colored bulbs, there were a few that had black scuffs on them. They weren't very big but they were noticeable. Some of the packaging was a little beat up on the ends but nothing was broken. Overall, I really think these are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect FALL Color
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! I LOVE the glow of my 9ft tree in my living room but my husband didn’t want to decorate for Christmas right after Halloween. Our compromise was to make a Thanksgiving tree! These ornaments are the perfect burnt orange color and the quality of each ornament is fantastic. One ornament was broken on top, but I should be able to glue it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Baretich

customer_reviews.title: Received  shattered and damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I can not return this item now, when I received this item around December 17, 2018 it was damaged, poor quality and I was very upset since it was already close to the Christmas. I hope others know that this was not a good purchase. I am very sad to know that some items on amazon are just not work purchasing and better off getting from a department store like Target.
customer_reviews.author: Myri Pompey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. I wanted a cream color to do with red and more “natural” look. Great value, sturdy, and we love each has different designs.
customer_reviews.author: DPreston

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but one broke before opening
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful on my white tree! Shiny and lovely. Only downside is that one didn’t have a top at all (appeared broken) but I didn’t want to send it all back after my tree was up so I used a clip to make a makeshift top. Hoping the others I bought dont have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small But Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly and the colour is just as it's pictured. Although they were smaller than I expected, that's my fault as I didn't properly look at the size in the description. The only reason I didn't give these the full five stars is because a few of the ornaments were broken. Still, for the price, I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Crites

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but Arrived Defective
customer_reviews.text: While the ornaments are quite pretty, unfortunately 1/4 of them were broken in some way. Many had the hanging piece broken or completely fell off, some of the glitter balls had weird deformities. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great price
customer_reviews.text: Wanted some silver balls for my Christmas tree, and these are perfect. They are lightweight and not glass, which is perfect for my tile floor. I also love that it doesn’t just have one type of ornament there are a few variations. You get about 25 ornaments in here.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Lundeberg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these ornaments last year for Christmas, my kids really loved them and so did I. They’re very sturdy, and how i know this is because my kids have dropped them numerous times and they’re still holding up. I highly recommend these ornaments.
customer_reviews.author: Sheronica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty ornaments.
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty! Love the shade of green and the glittery ones especially. Only thing I don't like is the lid. I ordered another color and the lid is cracked and broken. But I really like these ornaments!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sycylo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 3ft trees.
customer_reviews.text: The ornaments are perfect size for my 3ft fake Christmas tree. And with the perfect amount to decorate my tree all the way around. None of the decorations came broken. One did have discoloration like it has been scraped from the inside. But that was it, I put that ornament in the back. I certaintly plan on repurchasing and in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kikachu

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and was having trouble finding- a bulk quantity of white-only symmetrical ornaments. The plain ball ornaments look very cheap, but I couldn’t have afforded 34 high quality white resin ornaments. Overall, I’d recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Beutiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this color of the Christmas balls . This will look so beautiful on our tree this year. This was the color of our wedding , love this color. So we are looking so forward to put these on our tree this year.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Ohmacht

customer_reviews.title: I'm so disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: I'm thinking this is not too small but when I open the package....I'm so disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Mharves

customer_reviews.title: Inspect packaging, it's flimsy and fragile
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving two packages of this item that we had purchased, it wasn't until we opened the other package that I realized the packaging was broken and hooks were missing. Was already halfway through so it wasn't worth packing them up and returning them. Also, the strings on them dont like to stay tied and a couple broke at the top easily. I lost 4 total from 2 packages
customer_reviews.author: Travers

customer_reviews.title: ... were stuck to the balls and the packaging was terrible a few of the balls were
customer_reviews.text: Strings were stuck to the balls and the packaging was terrible a few of the balls were damaged
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing 8 were damaged when I opened the box, would have been great if they weren’t, the color was exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Christenson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Some ornaments were broken inside the cheap plastic container it came in. The container was also cracked throughout. Honestly, dollar tree ornaments are better than these. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Omgggg this is exactly what I was looking for I got the teal color and they are amazing..will load picture later..
customer_reviews.author: MARIA

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I have a one year old son and did not want to risk him breaking bulbs on the tree. they’re definitely cheap quality... Two of the bulbs were missing their tops when they arrived. But they do their job and I feel satisfied enough with them
customer_reviews.author: shanna

customer_reviews.title: Shipping could be better!
customer_reviews.text: A good quarter of these bulbs were dented. 2 stars. Like them alot apart from the dented ones. Would be 5 stars had they not been dented. Tried using the dented ones for the back of the tree and I still see the dents 😏
customer_reviews.author: WannabeAmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice variety of finishes & all the ball ornaments are the same size
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and seem to be shatterproof. There is a nice variety of shiny, matte & frosted ornaments. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The ornaments are very nice. They arrived all okay. None were broken or scratched. My only issue is of course the glitter. It was all over all of the non glitter ornaments. Several spots were bald because the glitter came off while in transit I assume. Other than that, they look lovely on my tree.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Parson

customer_reviews.title: About the size and feel of a ping pong ball.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in Purple, Gold, Green, and Red. They are about the size and feel of a ping pong ball. I've already managed to drop a couple of them and they are indeed "shatter proof". They look really nice. Better I assume because of their smaller size. I am a fan. Maybe I'll pick some silver and teal ones up next year.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pink color 😃
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect light pink for my Victorian 4feet Christmas tree I ordered the 2” ones could have went smaller but still please with color and size I really don’t write reviews but anyone looking for the best pink color xmas bulbs these are it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought three colors in two different sizes for a Thanksgiving table centerpiece. The colors and textures are beautiful. The only reason I did not give them five stars is that some of the seams on some of the textures are very visible.
customer_reviews.author: dijit

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller than your average Christmas balls but it worked and it brings my tree dimension. They are true to color and really pretty for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size for my Christmas tree but came broken
customer_reviews.text: First off, I loved the size of the balls it was perfect for the 8” Christmas tree we bought. Looked beautiful! Patterns were nice and simple. Disliked, the balls came cracked due to the plastic they were made of were way too delicate and cheap. I would love to order some white ones for next year but if they’re going to be cracked/broken I rather not.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Update to OH WELL!
customer_reviews.text: Good, but package was broken and one ornament was smashed! Update... This year the package wasn't smashed! I gave 5 stars. Good show! I was going to get glass ones but only for the tree. It was a good filler.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Ornaments looks like image shown
customer_reviews.text: Product is in condition stated. The quality is very good considering the price. I ordered 2 sets of the 34count 1.57" (68 ornaments) and they fill up our 7.5' tree pretty well(we have some ornaments prior to this new purchase). Thankfully none of the ornaments were broken. The material feels like sturdy ping pong balls. The ornaments come with a stringed hook attached, as well as 34+ ornament hooks. I would purchase again next time, but in the largest size.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty, and they look like they won't break too ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably my fault, but I had no idea how tiny these were. They are very very small. We have a 5 foot tree and well....I don't think we will be able to cover a 1/4 of with these 24 baubles. They are pretty, and they look like they won't break too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Elliotte Webb

customer_reviews.title: True to photo
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they are plastic, so anticipate plastic, but I personally think the quality is quite high. My mom was actually convinced they were glass before being told otherwise. I bought the champagne, and they came true to the color in the photo. None were broken or damaged. I am quite happy with what I received for the price I paid!
customer_reviews.author: DCW

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the champagne variety. I needed additional ornaments to fill blank space on my tree and these did the trick. I got tons of compliments on my tree. Shatterproof for the win!
customer_reviews.author: Sham

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but got the job done
customer_reviews.text: Some of the ornaments had black spots or streaks that were not removable. It seemed like they weren't painted correctly. There were also one or two that were cracked and broken.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Birge

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas tree decorations the blue is such a beautiful colour and looks amazing with my other silver decorations ... great buy
customer_reviews.author: Cibele

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical about plastic ornament, have always has glass/metal before, but these ornaments are just lovely and have the added benefit of being non-breakable! I love the assorted styles that come in this set and the amount that you receive. I ordered a set in burgundy and one in gold to mix and match. Love them, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. King

customer_reviews.title: Eh, theyre ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok product for the price, some of the parts that you use to string the ornmants up with are broken. Just purchased cause I could not find white Christmas balls anywhere else. Also bought these in the beginning of December and didn't receive them until 2 days before Christmas. Would always receive a message saying the shipping date had changed every week, very annoying and unprofessional.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Massey

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: They look great. A couple were bent because they are rather cheap but as long as you don’t have small kids messing with them, you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: NM Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Loot at the description carefully
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t look at the description and was shocked by the size of this Christmas tree ornaments. They look cute, but very tiny. Will just compliment the set of regular size , but cannot be used alone
customer_reviews.author: Valeriia, Denys

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Very very cheap plastic ornaments. I guess you get what you pay for though. I would compare these to ornaments you could buy at a dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: MMHZR

customer_reviews.title: Color and cost
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and color. Also nice that hooks were included.
customer_reviews.author: deborahe gibson

customer_reviews.title: Not great but you know that already
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are small but that is reflected in the product description. Made of plastic, they are fairly poor quality and have scuffs and molding marks on them. There no real reason to buy these unless you are making some kind of crafting project.
customer_reviews.author: InterTube Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These ornaments were just perfect! The glitter stays on. It's not too glittery as to look cheesy. They look more expensive than their price. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DC Review

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Since I didn't have time for a big tree this year I purchased a small one maybe 3 1/2 feet. I ordered several packages of these bulbs and they were perfect. They shine like glass, have rich color and reflect light from the tree's lights and tinsil. And when dropped to the floor they don't break or take any damage. When I do have a large tree again I'll also use these bulbs to fit in to those small areas on it. Great purchase! If these come in larger bulbs I'll buy them too.
customer_reviews.author: Cousin  Dar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Light Blue
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful light blue color! Love them! They're perfect for my project! The pictures don't do them justice!
customer_reviews.author: Karakreative

product_meta.title: KI Store 20ct Christmas Ball Ornaments Shatterproof Christmas Decorations Large Tree Balls for Holiday Wedding Party Decoration, Tree Ornaments Hooks Included 3.15” (80mm White)
feature_bullets: 2020 KI Store Christmas balls 3.15” are done in 4 special finishes / shapes: Shiny / Matte, Glitter, Wave, Onion. There are 23 different colors of decorative balls allow you to build your collection quickly and decorate with more possibilities.

Make great addition to your Christmas decorations and holiday decoration. Perfect home decor for a variegated display of Christmas, wedding, engagement, anniversary, party, as hanging ornaments on tree branches, table centerpieces, around banister, above reception, etc. It is also a great choice for commercial holiday decorations.

Shatterproof Christmas tree balls are combine the beauty and luster of real glass with the unbreakable practicality of plastic. Ideal for families with kids and pets. Set you free from worrying about them getting hurt and glass shards everywhere.

Plain colored Christmas balls for can also be used for all sorts of projects. They can be painted with acrylic paints, wrapped with strings or ribbons, updated with a snowflake or glittery letters, etc. Turn plain colored balls ornament into magical work of art!

SET OF 20. Christmas ball ornaments are made of thicker high quality plastic and more sophisticated processing. Hooks for Christmas balls included to make hanging easier. Balls are equipped with Caps, String Hangers. Dimensions: 3.15" (80mm) in diameter. Material(s): plastic/glitter
